abstract: Memo from Europe; euro, political project meant to unite Europe in sphere of collective prosperity, instead seems to be pulling the continent apart; crisis has roots in imbalances between north and south, rich and poor, export- and service-led economies.
snippet: The crisis has roots in imbalances between north and south, rich and poor, export- and service-led economies.
lead_paragraph: The crisis has roots in imbalances between north and south, rich and poor, export- and service-led economies.

headline.main: Euro, Meant to Unite Europe, Seems to Rend It
headline.print_headline: Euro, Meant to Unite Europe, Seems to Be Rending It
headline.seo: Euro, Meant to Unite Europe, Seems to Be Dividing It
